title: Administrative Staff – Department of Humanities, Social and Political Sciences | ETH Zurich
snippet: The Departmental Administrative Staff is the central point of contact for the Department of Humanities, Social and Political Sciences (D-GESS). Its members ensure flawless operations in all operative tasks and responsibilities of the Department. Among other tasks, the Departmental Administrative Staff serves as · Point of contact for students, staff, and professors · Link between the D-GESS and other departments, the ETH Academic Services (in matters pertaining to studies), the staff units of the Executive Board, and the Infrastructure Divisions

title: Humanities, Political and Social Sciences | ETH Zurich
snippet: During a degree course at ETH Zurich a total of eight credit points have to be earned in the area of Science in Perspective – six at bachelor’s and two at master’s level. D-GESS offers a Bachelor programme in Public Policy for Professional Officers. Department of Humanities, Social and Political Sciences
